name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SitePro: Chat with websites like a pro

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SitePro revolutionizes your web browsing experience by allowing you to integrate AI chatbot technology directly into any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say goodbye to endless searching and make your online experience smoother with SitePro. Train your custom chatbot on any website with just a few clicks. Simply download the extension, create a chatbot, and start interacting with the website effortlessly.

Tired of browsing endlessly for that one piece of information? With SitePro, you can now collect links from the website you visit. Search and select the links relevant to your needs and start chatting.

Recent chats are saved in your dashboard. Come back to your chatbots whenever you want.

Common use-cases:

- Summarizing a web article
SitePro allows you to quicky summarize a web article.

- Extracting useful information:
While browsing on a website, a user is often presented with lots of useless information. With SitePro you can extract the information you really need.

- Finding the right product
With SitePro, you can now chat your way to the right product on any e-commerce website.
